comments:
After a while eclipse edit stops invoking command completion dialogs (this 
includes the quickfixes). The log (to me) does noy suggest anything i can do 
to fix this. This behaviour only happens after a while, which suggest to me it 
is a memory leak (dejavu: **NATIVE CODE**). At first I could work for at least 
hours on end before eclipse started doing this, but lately the frequency has 
increased. Is there a fix? 

Here is a sniplet of the error log (the file contains just to many of the same 
stack trace) :
